description: APPLICATION FOR A LAWFUL DEVELOPMENT CERTIFICATE IN RESPECT OF THE PROPOSED ERECTION OF A HIP TO GABLE AND REAR ROOF DORMER EXTENSION
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The operations comprising the erection of a hip to gable and rear roof dormer extension with an obscure glazed and fixed shut gable window would consist of the enlargement of a dwelling house within the meaning of Class B of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class B. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.

Condition : 2 - The operations comprising the installation of three roof lights in the front roof slope and an obscure glazed fixed shut window in the gable elevation would consist of any other alteration to the roof of the dwelling house within the meaning of Class C of Part 1 of Schedule 2 to the Town & Country Planning (General Permitted Development)  (England) Order 2015 "the Order" and would comply with the development tolerances set out in said Class C. The operation would therefore have been granted planning permission by Article 3 of the Order.
Condition : 3 - Nothwithstanding the details show in the approved drawings the new gable window should be obscure glazed and fixed shut to a height relative to the floor level of 1.7m
